page.title: 18 TRADE
page.content: There are two Village Stores/Post Offices in our area - one in Perry and one in Gt.Staughton. Both have long opening hours and stock a wide range of food and household goods. Although our survey showed that most people do their bulk shopping in St.Neots or Huntingdon, the Village Stores are used daily by 33% and weekly by 60% of the Sample for day to day items. Gt.Staughton also has a Butcher's, an Electrical/Plumbing/D.I.Y. Shop (incorporating a Building Soc.Office) and three Public Houses (with another in Perry). There is an attractive Arts and Crafts Centre - the Taggart Gallery - by the Church, and in The Highway is O'Dell's Garage (4* petrol at Â£1.98 per gallon) with Workshop area for vehicle servicing and repairs.
